abstract: Puerto Rico Electric Power Authority is reportedly close to debt restructuring agreement; terms under consideration include bond exchange.
lead_paragraph: The terms under consideration to restructure $5.7 billion in debt included a bond exchange, which would mean a permanent loss for participating bondholders.

headline.main: Puerto Rico Electric Utility Is Said to Be Near Debt Deal
headline.print_headline: Puerto Rico Electric Utility Is Said to Be Near Debt Deal

snippet: The terms under consideration to restructure $5.7 billion in debt included a bond exchange, which would mean a permanent loss for participating bondholders.
